task.name: v.surf.rst
task.label: Performs surface interpolation from vector points map by splines.
task.description: Spatial approximation and topographic analysis from given point or isoline data in vector format to floating point raster format using regularized spline with tension.

parameter.name: input
parameter.label: Name of input vector map
parameter.description: Or data source for direct OGR access

parameter.name: layer
parameter.label: Layer number or name
parameter.description: Vector features can have category values in different layers. This number determines which layer to use. When used with direct OGR access this is the layer name.

parameter.name: zcolumn
parameter.label: Name of the attribute column with values to be used for approximation
parameter.description: If not given and input is 2D vector map then category values are used. If input is 3D vector map then z-coordinates are used.

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword
parameter.description: Example: income < 1000 and inhab >= 10000

parameter.name: elevation
parameter.description: Name for output surface elevation raster map

parameter.name: slope
parameter.description: Name for output slope raster map

parameter.name: aspect
parameter.description: Name for output aspect raster map

parameter.name: pcurvature
parameter.description: Name for output profile curvature raster map

parameter.name: tcurvature
parameter.description: Name for output tangential curvature raster map

parameter.name: mcurvature
parameter.description: Name for output mean curvature raster map

parameter.name: deviations
parameter.description: Name for output deviations vector point map

parameter.name: cvdev
parameter.description: Name for output cross-validation errors vector point map

parameter.name: treeseg
parameter.description: Name for output vector map showing quadtree segmentation

parameter.name: overwin
parameter.description: Name for output vector map showing overlapping windows

parameter.name: mask
parameter.description: Name of raster map used as mask

parameter.name: tension
parameter.description: Tension parameter

parameter.name: smooth
parameter.description: Smoothing parameter

parameter.name: smooth_column
parameter.description: Name of the attribute column with smoothing parameters

parameter.name: segmax
parameter.description: Maximum number of points in a segment

parameter.name: npmin
parameter.description: Minimum number of points for approximation in a segment (>segmax)

parameter.name: dmin
parameter.description: Minimum distance between points (to remove almost identical points)

parameter.name: dmax
parameter.description: Maximum distance between points on isoline (to insert additional points)

parameter.name: zscale
parameter.description: Conversion factor for values used for approximation

parameter.name: theta
parameter.description: Anisotropy angle (in degrees counterclockwise from East)

parameter.name: scalex
parameter.description: Anisotropy scaling factor

flag.name: c
flag.description: Perform cross-validation procedure without raster approximation

flag.name: d
flag.description: Output partial derivatives instead of topographic parameters

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
